The nova.console.fake Module¶

Fake ConsoleProxy driver for tests.

class FakeConsoleProxy¶

Bases: object

Fake ConsoleProxy driver.

console_type¶

Trim password to length, and any other massaging.

Trim password to length, and any other massaging.

Returns random console password.
